name: Jalisco Pear
description: This Gramercy Tavern cocktail is the ideal fall drink for margarita lovers.
recipeIngredient: Garnish: fresh or dried pear slice

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add tequila, pear liqueur, allspice dram, and lemon. Shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds. Strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with pear and serve.
